main_definition: A man who has never been married or a person, typically a young adult, living alone without being engaged to be married.

meanings_and_examples.example: John is a bachelor and hasn't found the right woman yet.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who has not been married, regardless of gender
meanings_and_examples.example: She considers herself a bachelor as she enjoys living alone without being in a committed relationship.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A young adult living independently, often without a spouse or significant other
meanings_and_examples.example: At 25 years old, he is still considered a bachelor because he hasn't settled down yet.
